mapper.select: select c.car_id, c.car_name,b.brand_id, b.brand_name, c.car_img, b.brand_explain, b.brand_img from car c inner join brand b on c.brand_id = b.brand_id where c.brand_id=#{brand_id}
SELECT c.car_id, c.car_name, c.car_price, c.car_type, c.car_fuel, c.fuel_type, c.car_img, b.brand_name, c.brand_id FROM CAR c inner join brand b on c.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE c.CAR_ID = #{car_id}
SELECT c.car_id, color.color_0,color.color_1,color.color_2,color.color_3 FROM CAR c inner join car_color color on c.car_id = color.car_id WHERE color.CAR_ID =#{car_id}
